name: tm25
effect: Teaches Thunder to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Thunder to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch.
